technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned that their trip was cut short due to the pandemic, but did not express any strong negative affect.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and tried to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
questions: What's your initial experience regarding the COVID when you heard about it? [00:07:16]
So when you say new normal, you mean like currently this new normal or do you mean like that new normal back in 2020? [00:09:56]
What's your experience after you take the vaccine? Did you have side effects? [00:17:31]
similarity_statements: I feel like I'm similar to you in that I also like going to explore places, trying new restaurants. [00:06:16]
vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and analyzing the situation.
general_notes: The participant is very pro-science and believes in the importance of vaccines and boosters.
